name: Alternating Space
description:
Ludum Dare 42 Compo entry.

Input


KeyboardGamepadMoveLeft Arrow / Right ArrowLeft / Right Stick or DPad
JumpSpaceA / B / Cross
RestartTABSelect / -
FullscreenClick button
Click button

Gameplay hint

Try to press all red buttons at the same time with the help of your alter ego from a different dimension.

Run through the green gate to activate your mirror.

Look out for mirrored inputs
